Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A very modern and comfortable hotel next to the Old Street metro station It is a big hotel but not anonymous The staff gives personal attention and is very friendly and helpful The room is spacious with a very comfortable bed Lights curtains and tv can all be controlled with a touch screen very futuristic We had a room with a beautiful view over the city Overall excellent value for money

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: poor shower telly on low volume can not turn up as preset treated like a child wife has a massage massage good no candles or ambience to room at all spa pool cold also came here for roof top bar bar not there no more which is a shame restaurant food ok but whole area god do with a rethink very bland

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Couldn t complain about a thing
Positive_Review: Stunning hotel had everything I could have asked for staff where great and would have loved to have stayed longer to enjoy all their facilities spa etc

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The staff speak with very strong French accent English which I have a little problem to listen to 3 people stayed in the room but only provided 2 people s robes and toothbrushes and slippers A 5 star hotel should have prepared for us However the service is incredible so I don t find this too disappointing
Positive_Review: The bed is extremely comfy The natural lighting is perfect The room design is very elegant and modern The staff is very friendly The room has all the equipment i needed

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Loved everything
Positive_Review: Amazing modern rooms and very friendly staff Great breakfast with lots of choice Hotel was really close to the tube station so very easy to get around London Having a coffee machine in the room was really nice and the dressing gowns are so fluffy We were also given a 20 voucher to spend in the bar which was a really nice touch and I would defiantly stay again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I booked a cot for my one year old When I arrived at the room at 7 30 They had made the sofa into a bed I complained and it took an hour to resolve By which time my daughter as very tired and upset I had to make three phone calls to resolve First to housekeeping then to reception and another to housekeeping I booked into the hotel on return from Paris so that my daughter wouldn t be late to bed Which clearly was not the outcome Ps small pot of M Ms 6
Positive_Review: The level of room technology Comfort of bed

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were very polite and friendly Room was comfortable had a really good nights sleep Shower was powerful Coffee tea facilities better than most

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The bed seemed to be two singles pushed together so it had a weird dip after some time of rolling about in it The TV peaks volume level 25 which can be annoying if someone is showering while you are watching tv Food at the hotel is craaaazy high we ordered food in the area there are so many places to eat in shoreditch

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Check in could have been faster
Positive_Review: Stayed here previously as the location is close to where my son lives and therefore very convenient Hotel is very modern and staff very friendly Check in seemed to be a little slow but we were offered a glass of Prosecco as we waited We booked a Club double and the room was spacious clean with the usual mod cons Wouldn t hesitate to stay again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Room took a while to cool down warm up

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Positive_Review: Totally disappointed had been recommended this hotel booked the restaurant for the evening meal daughters 21st birthday actually only to be told on arrival it was closed an noone could locate our booking had to find a taxi and go elsewhere not towels available in the swimming area and upon our arrival of a pre booked booking reception insisted they need to see out card we booked with which was at home had to ask our son to send a picture of it do fail to see the relevance of this

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: It was a triple room but there were only 2 proper mugs and insufficient milk cartons

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Positive_Review: Comfortable Beds

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I can t find anything to complain about
Positive_Review: I liked everything about my stay from the check in to the check out everything went perfectly We can feel the house is very well kept everyone was warm and professional it was extremely clean design and for the price especially in London it s an extremely good deal The SPA and swimming pool are a big plus

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I think its difficult to find such balanced hotels in terms of Work Leisure I stayed 8 nights at this property and everything was exceptionally good During my entire stay not a single instance i felt any lack of service standards or any hassles like calling reception for iron board or something not working which is very common while staying at hotels The staff was very co operative and the rooms were modern and equipped with all the facilities

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Welcome at reception seemed a bit unprofessional We paid for the room upon arrival and where then asked whether we would like to deposit a second amount transaction for extras The invoice however was only issued after check out Why do you have to bother me twice The towels weren t clean Can happen but won t if you check The door didn t close You would think a modern building would have working doors but it seems that this skill hasn t reached Tech City yet
Positive_Review: Location is great and its a modern place

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: in general the hotel was lovely until we got locked in our bedroom before checked and had to have the staff to break the lock to let us out this was very stressful for my partner

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Picking at hairs it would have been good to have some basic info in the room about what time breakfast was and what time check out was There may have been something in the room but I couldn t find it anywhere It was easy enough to call reception and ask though

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Check in was slow TV didn t work fully needed maintenance man to fix sound which was distorted Didn t have all channels was supposed to be fixed but never was Booked a 1 hour hot stone massage took over 24 hours to respond via email I confirmed booking via email within the hour and arrived for massage at discussed time to be told the booking had not been confirmed The junior staff member wasn t very helpful had an attitude and rather than discussing the issue immediately escalated to manager Manager was apologetic but offered no compensation other than a complimentary massage the next day which was no good as we were leaving the next morning Not the service I d expect at a so called 5 hotel
Positive_Review: Scented room was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I can t fault anything
Positive_Review: The hotel was amazing the staff were so friendly and helpful the hotel bar was a great place to drink The spa was beautiful and I can t wait to return

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Everything was very disorganised a booking of 2 rooms caused great confusion and my husband and I were given a room key for the room where our friend had already checked in we walked straight in on him thankfully dressed They did give us complimentary breakfast to apologise which was nice but it did confirm that I would never pay the full price for the breakfast it was very average and they charge something like 25 per person per night Service in the bar was very slow and breakfast was also slow service hard to get a coffee for example They then overcharged my credit card and I had to call back once I realised to get them to refund the difference Lots of style with not a lot of substance unfortunately
Positive_Review: Really nice looking hotel with lots of high tech gadgets Comfortable bed decent bathroom and close to tube station and restaurants bars

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The organisation in the spa Not enough information on the lockers in changing room And very small changing room space
Positive_Review: The building is amazing The staff very helpful The rooms are totally brilliant

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: We had problems with the cell phone that is provided by the hotel Charger in the room wasn t working properly so we were not able to fully take advantage of this otherwise lovely perk
Positive_Review: Front desk staff upgraded our free continental breakfast to a full English breakfast buffet which was awesome and had a great selection of items We also got free coupons for the lounge which we enjoyed Location is close to Tube and walkable to city centre St Paul s Thames Tower of London Weekend markets etc Great restaurants nearby Jamie Oliver s Fifteen is literally around the corner Concierge booked us dinner at a nearby restaurant called Jones Family Project which was one of the best meals of our trip Highly recommend the prime rib for the table Overall had a great stay at M by Montcalm Shoreditch and will book again next time in London

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: TV reception quality was awful Some of the electronics in the room just failed every time you tried to use them Some of the staff members were unhelpful and patronising No bath robe in my room as standard so I had to call down to reception for one No obvious way of calling reception so I had to do it from my mobile after google ing the number

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Positive_Review: I loved that I requested a quiet room as this booking was for work with 6 30am start each day The room was really quiet for a busy central location in location I liked that the problems that I had were quickly sorted 99 of the staff I met were lovely and couldn t have been more helpful The room was lovely

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I checked twice about using the spa the next day after checkout and was informed we could use the spa until 2pm When we arrived we were told that was not the case Eventually after a discussion spa staff agreed to let us use the facilities

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Couldn t fault anything

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The 8oz rib eye steak was 25 and I felt this was quite over priced for what it was especially as fries were not included neither was a steak sauce More variety of food such as different steaks would improve the room service dinning experience
Positive_Review: The hotel and rooms uphold a stylish presentation The staff were friendly and approachable Room service was delivered in a timely manner and presented beautifully Amazing bathroom Spa and pool an excellent addition to the hotel stay

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The hotel look good if you don t look too close For a luxory hotel 5 star we were missing the detail care everthing was aranged and without love Looking on the surface everthing was shining but if you were looking behind the doors or some parts of the furniture it was dirty and looked worn and loveless The same is the pool and Spa area The showers behind the pool and all the other parts of stainless steel are rusty because it is the wrong material It is A2 and not A4 If you look behind the shower doors it is dirty moldy and greasy We choosed the hotel also because it has a roof top bar but it was only open for private events And some of the waiters told us it is going to be closed anyway It would have been good to mention it on the homepage The service personal is very good and fiendly nothing to complain The rooms are nice and comfortable the only thing which is missing are the toilet brush in the bathroom The breakfast is not worth the money The position of the hotel is excellent
Positive_Review: The position of the hotel is excellent The service personal is very good and fiendly nothing to complain

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Some of the SPA facilities weren t working properly
Positive_Review: It was our second stay at this hotel and to be honest for whatever reason it wasn t as good as the first one Everything was very good but not exceptional as during our first visit

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Every member of staff encountered was absolutely lovely and they couldn t do enough to help even when help wasn t requested they were quick to offer to carry bags and go the extra mile to ensure my stay was great

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The massage was very light and pretty rushed Some of the spa facilities were unavailable on our visit
Positive_Review: We stayed here for my wife s 30th birthday weekend I told the hotel in advance of the celebration and Charlene did a great job with decorating the bed with balloons and flowers and giving us some absolutely delicious pie and fruits It was a lovely added touch and surprise for my wife The room was on the 9th floor with a nice view It s all pretty high tech with touchpads to control the lighting and electric curtains although sometimes it can be a tad temperamental The room and bathroom was clean spacious and comfortable The hotel is in a good location just a short walk from Old street station

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The lobby is quite small It s quite a distance from the airport but close proximity to down town if you need to be close to where the action is
Positive_Review: This is an excellent facility in the heart of the city Room was very convenient and high tech Internet was very stable and fast I did not manage to try the breakfast due to lack of time but I m sure that it must be great too considering all other aspects of the hotel

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The place seems to be very understaffed and the staff that are there are not terribly helpful and perhaps poorly trained It took a very long time to get a room service menu The reception telephone seems regularly unstaffed as it rang out quite a few times The room is also filled with these ridiculous gimmicky controls that are not terribly good The lights and air conditioning for example are controlled by tablets and ours did not work very well and crashed a couple of times Give us the tablet by all means but also give us light switches as an override Also it was 10 30 pm and the roof restaurant was closed and the bar not staffed
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed and pillows The location is good for Shoreditch

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The spa is always very busy so if you re after a relaxing break this is not the place to visit Pool are is always very packed so much so that there aren t enough loungers for everyone I even overheard the receptionist say they had ran out of lockers Again if you re looking for a relaxing break STAY AWAY
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I should have been offered to check the account before asking for the final amount to pay and had to ask for a receipt

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel reception is beautiful On arrival we were welcomed with Prosecco and freshly baked muffins and a fruit platter Tonic and Remedy is a wonderful bar with delicious food The room is absolutely exquisite and spacious with high tech features and awesome light settings This is the type of hotel you don t want to leave The staff were always greeting and were more than happy to help out This hotel is conveniently located next to Old Street Station and is a 15 minute walk from the vibrant bars and restaurants of shoreditch There were a few great little restaurants within a 5 minute walk I will be back to this exceptional hotel Do yourself a favour and indulge in this gem

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Immaculate hotel great location Staff approachable helpful friendly In room gadgets which impressed the fella a beautiful spa which we both relaxed in for most of the morning We didn t eat at the hotel so not able to comment on food Beds amazingly comfortable Would recommend this hotel whether it be as a base to explore London or a chilled out overnight weekend break

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This hotel s customer service exceeded my expectations The housekeepers were always friendly and helpful and said hi when I passed them in the hallway From time to time they even asked me if I needed anything When my coffee maker was having issues the housekeeper promptly called for a maintenance specialist who was just so courteous and helpful And when I left an item in the room and came back a couple of days later to retrieve it they had kept it neatly tucked away for me Really outstanding keep up the great work

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No bathrobes even though it said it would be included in the room Otherwise good and clean with a lot of practical details I would recommend anyone to consider this hotel for business trips but on my next private visit to London I will probably try to find a more boutique like hotel or a more classic one with more personality
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Fabulous hotel Everything from lights to curtains operated by iPAD type remote control Room was amazing free afternoon snack and rose petals on the bed 3 minute walk to Metro Underground Definetley recommend

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Pool spa facilities were out of order both days we were there and this was a big reason I chose the hotel in the first place I was only offered an alternative 10 minute walk to another location s pool on the second day in the evening so that didn t help much The first day it was implied we would get some complimentary drinks food to make up for it but we didn t receive this either Considering how crucial the wellness area was in my decision to book the hotel it was very disappointing that it wasn t available and even though I know unexpected issues and maintenance can happen I would have expected an effort to make up for it
Positive_Review: The hotel is beautiful friendly staff high tech rooms

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Under 12 s could not use the pool My son is 11 so just missed out They could perhaps have set times for children Unfortunately this was a facility I felt was paid for but not useable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I can t think of anything I didn t like

Negative_Review: The tv was preset to not go above a certain volume which wasn t loud enough and the tv had no guide to tell you what was on

Negative_Review: The view from the room was on the building being constructed hope that will finish soon Bar of the hotel closes too early at 11pm

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I felt slightly worried about using the lockers in case by bits got stuck in there as the combination system had no instructions and you only put the code in once Changing rooms were on the small side The hotel bar closed reasonably early by 11pm The night time room service food menu was rather small and limited with no nibbles
Positive_Review: We have been to many luxury premium style hotels in and around London and often avoid larger ones and instead opting for smaller boutique style hotels however this hotel way surpassed all of my expectations by putting in all the little luxury touches that you could expect from a boutique hotel Positives Our first contact was with front desk where the member of staff was polite helpful welcoming and informative He couldn t be any more helpful and was a great first impression The reception area is clean modern and comfortable Fruit seating lighting furniture and air fresheners all ensured that the hotel had a luxurious feel The hallway looked glamourous and modern clean and air conditioned Our room had lovely modern furniture and decor Towels and bedding were great quality and the bed and pillows offered superior comfort and a great nights sleep There were Elemis consumeable products in the bathroom as well as an excellent hairdryer and even an umbrella There were also dressing gowns slippers and a mobile gadget that you can use as a tour guide if needed Free in room safe iron and ironing board too Complimentary and premium quality teas coffees as well as a well stocked mini barvwitb transparent pricing There were room and bedside options for the excellent air con system as well as dimmable room and bedside lighting under floor heating mood lighting night lighting curtain operation and TV including Sky Sports The mirror in the room and bathroom were thoughtful touches often missing from other hotels and a great size desk and lounge chair with footstool The spa was equally lovely with complimentary towel dressing gown and pool side flip flops to use during your visit and refrigerated water by the pool The shower also had complimentary Elemis products for use Pool sauna and steam room of a fair size and small Jacuzzi too Breakfast was delicious with very attentive staff and great view onto the street below

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The pads used to control the lighting keeped slipping out of the WiFi so we had get to get help from reception to turn them of to sleep but the staff was extremely helpful and quick to get it sorted
Positive_Review: The you went to check in I got given a glass of presseco which after a long day traveling went down a treat The room was beautiful spacious and clean I could not fault it the bed was comfortable and so big had very good night s sleep there was no noise from outside either As guests we got to use the spa and pool after a long day was so relaxing and just what u needed the staff are helpful and show you where to go and provide u with towels robes and slippers to wear We even got a free complimentary breakfast I would definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Facilities were dodgy tv and kettle didn t work initially they had a slight problem with their aircon although managed to fix it Would of liked an arrival drink for what we paid
Positive_Review: Bathroom comfy bed high tech nice TV good location very clean room continental breakfast that was included was nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This property was Absolutely outstanding From the service i received when booking till the moment I checked out One person in Particular made the stay special She worked in Guest services and see me on arrival I would like to thank all the staff for making the stay so special and arranging some romance in the room for my partner The Gym and pool facilities proved to be very useful during my stay and were not busy at all We will 100 Be staying at this property again CelebratingLove

Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Personally I feel this hotel is over priced I booked this hotel because of a special offer on booking com the price for a deluxe double was reduced from 300 to 167 The price I paid I think was fair for the room but if I d paid 300 I wouldn t have been very impressed It s a nice room but I wouldn t say it was superior to hotels which charge 150 200 a night Especially as that price doesn t even include breakfast Given that it is a tech hotel we would have expected the TV to be better quality The picture was blurry the sound was distorted and buzzy and it was difficult to operate the remote buttons weren t very responsive
Positive_Review: The staff here are very helpful and polite Check in was easy and we were offered a complimentary glass of prosecco a nice touch Our room was on the 6th floor a good size with a nice bathroom We liked the tech touches which consisted of 2 tablets by the bed to control curtains and lighting night light desk light bedside light mood lighting etc a tablet by the bathroom to control lights air conditioning underfloor heating bathroom only They also offer a complimentary smartphone with unlimited 4G which you can take out of the hotel and with you for the duration of your trip There was also a Nespresso machine kettle selection of teas and coffee and a minibar although a little empty The bed was super comfy and warm one of the best nights sleep ever We also liked the complimentary bath robes which were soft and cosy and complimentary slippers We walked to the hotel from South Bank to sight see and it took us around 45 minutes at a comfortable pace The location is fairly central you re minutes from Old Street Station

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No bath in room
Positive_Review: Comfy bed complimentary prosecco on arrival coffee machine an added bonus lots of really nice touches in room and everything is controlled by touch screen

Positive_Review: Really nice and responsive staff ready to help with each issue Special thanks to Victoria at the front desk Hotel is modern and cozy Great location nice surroundings I wish I had more time to enjoy the hotels SPA pool and gym There was a coffee machine in the room with complementary coffee capsules as well as tee and some biscuits Great to have slippers and dressing gown provided

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: one day the cleaning never came to our room and we had to call the hotel reception to arrange that for us the room was extremely hot at night we almost couldnt sleep without wokingup in the middle of the night sweating we didn t try the breakfast and also we didn t dine in any day or night so I really don t know about the food
Positive_Review: the hotel is located extremely close the Old Street station tube in the Northern line of the London underground its location is amazing if you want to live and breath the East London vibe since it is at the heart of Shoreditch with restaurants food and coffee chains and local pubs and cafes all within a very very close distance the hotel offers an indoor pool although not so big sized and a jacuzzi and full equiped gym which is very convinient since it opperates from very early in the morning the room is all modern inside and all features from the curtain drapes to the bed table lights operates through touch screens right next to the hotel there is a pret a manger chain and a sainsbury s local which is also very convinient for a quick breakfast or some grocery shopping within a 2 minute walking distance there is a bus stop that takes you straight to Oxford street no 55 upon arrival they upgraded us to a better room as the receptionist informed us from the room we have booked and our new room is located on the 12th floor offering us an almost panoramic view of London all the way to St Paul s cathedral highly recommended

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Cleaning the floors in main reception area for a long period whilst people checking in etc
Positive_Review: Love the devices that controlled the lighting ability to shut the curtains at the touch of a button and the room fragrance machine The bed was soooo comfortable Brilliant bars places to eat in close proximity

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I booked this as a surprise for my beloved I arrived early to check in and was delighted to receive a complimentary upgrade to a suite later we were treated to a bottle of Prosecco to celebrate our special night The iconic building is ultra modern and every detail of our stay was perfect from the incredibly comfortable massive bed which was like sleeping on clouds to the super soft bathrobes the Hermes toiletries plus the fantastic use of modern technology that allowed us to customise everything in the room including mood lighting and underfloor heating Our time spent in the indoor pool jacuzzi and steam room provided the perfect way to unwind from the stress of the cold grey London reality outside All the staff were wonderful the service was absolutely first class

Negative_Review: My only minor complaint was that parking was difficult I had to park at an NCP which is approx a 10 min walk from the hotel and this cost me a whopping 78 for 2 days Not the fault of the hotel but its the only thing that dampened my experience
Positive_Review: Amazing Fantastic Hotel By far the best hotel I have ever stayed at It is so hi tech everything about the hotel is new and fresh The entire room is controlled by touch screen The bathroom has underfloor heating the television is big and you can even change the colour of the lights in the room with the touch of a button Very very impressive The spa and pool area is designed by Versace and like the rest of the hotel just oozes class and elegance We were celebrating our wedding and my recent qualification we were given a free upgrade with a nice surprise of flowers and desserts waiting in our room

Negative_Review: The technology was confusing as didn t notice it initially my partner operated it and then in middle of the night I couldnt find a light switch TV technology wasn t working properly either My main gripe is that I made 3 separate bookings for various family members We had difficulty in getting payment made on separate cards and some bookings were billed twice prompt refund made on complaint but worst of all two couples checked in and gave in their cards but were shown to rooms occupied by other people One couple was given a new room fairly quickly but the other couple had to wait over an hour at around 11pm 12 midnight after a long tiring day before a room was found for them No compensation offered

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: On arrival and checking in at the hotel the staff at reception were very attentive and made us feel very welcome The staff were lovely and very friendly The gentleman who booked us in gave us an hours later check out after he asked what brought us to London and I replied my daughters 21st The hotel sent a balloon and little treats to eat for my daughters 21st birthday a lovely gesture and very much appreciated The USB port and one of the plug sockets on the side of tv unit were faulty which made them unusable The handy buddy charging dock was faulty would not charge so unusable I reported to reception so issues can be addressed for future guests Over all the room was lovely The bed and sofa bed were comfortable we slept with the mood lighting on we chose red The rainforest shower was most enjoyable as were the toiletries supplied Tea and coffee making facilities very good Good choice in mini bar but we did not use as rarely drink Over all we had a lovely experience staying at M by Montcalm and would like to thank the hotel and all staff for their hospitality
Positive_Review: We did not have breakfast

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: We weren t told that the lights air con etc were controlled by a panel and spent a lot of time in the dark looking for the light switch

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: State of the art Hotel Room features and facilities all linked up to touch screen panels making the stay easy relaxing and convenient Handy Travel companion providing a free and unlimited mobile service including calls SMS and mobile data for navigation browsing etc This device could be taken anywhere in London saving on costs and affording you with the same luxuries of being back at home using a mobile device without being cost conscious Hotel provided complimentary vouchers to use at the bar restaurant and lounge areas Great if you re travelling on a budget or just want to enjoy a relaxing drink or coffee in the Hotel each day of stay We were provided enough vouchers enabling us to have a meal each day at the Hotel without further chargers Hotel surprised me with a pleasant Birthday desert upon arrival very courteous and generous of the staff in doing so Hotel situated in close proximity of many convenient amenities such as an underground train station less than a 10 minute walk Sainsbury Supermarket literally 3 doors down from the Hotel Pret a Manger right next door The Three Crowns Pub Restaurant less than a 30 second walk from the Hotel and a few other quaint eateries Hotel facilities decor and furniture were modern and new in appearance Hotel staff very pleasant friendly helpful and hospitable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was amazing room was a very good size could not fault the staff at all They gave me a complimentary breakfast because I was having a bad day Which was a lovely little perk room service room was erm well the Menu left a lot to be desired I understand certain staple items on menus so that all the guest have something to choose from but the menu was just so boring nothing on the menu that was beyond the norm or sparked up a appetite in any shape or form and as a lone guest I wasn t keen on dining in the restaurant by myself and I like to dine in the room but the room service menu could do with a fresher take But the gentleman that served me was lovely most of the tv channels didn t work in the room and I couldn t get a phone signal but the hotel provides a mobile you can use during the stay Which is a very unique touch from the montcalm hotel chain and amazing value for money all in all

Negative_Review: I booked 4 or 5 rooms for different members of my family Two of the rooms were not allocated properly My relatives were given rooms that were already occupied by other people One set then had to wait over an hour around midnight before an empty room was found for them Both these two sets of guests paid for their rooms but I was also charged for them on my credit card These amounts 163 20 and 178 50 need to be refunded at once I also didn t like the touch screens Olwen Glynn Owen

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Everything in the room lights AC curtains Do Not Disturb indicator is controlled by a tablet There were three in the room but one didn t work The whole system rebooted once in the middle of the night which brought all the lights on And one evening the system froze so that I couldn t even turn the lights on It s a neat idea but obviously has some bugs

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The architecture creates a very high tech fasade and esthetically that is pleasant to look at from the outside but for the staying guest the rooms get very small windows and it can be suphocating The Samsung TV did not work properly it was often freezing screen The Spa stuff lacked organization and one had the feeling that they were not communicating well with the reception stuff I found the hotel room prize did not match the quality even if the quality was good for the most iPad is Ok but iPad to switch on and off every light not necessary
Positive_Review: Good location helpful stuff good bed quality relaxed atmosphere chic architecture in an up and coming neighborhood Good proximity to Old Street station gives easy transportation Very helpful city guide I Phone in the room a big bonus but the concierge was very good too

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fabulous hotel nothing was too much trouble the staff were so helpful The room was modern everything was controlled remotely even the curtains It was clean and very spacious for London Fresh coffee available in the rooms quality bath robes and toiletries everything you needed and more Having arrived too early to check in we left our bags with the concierge before going off for the day to see a show Old Street tube station is literally a one minute walk from the front door On return we were greeted by name and advised everything was ready for us and that our luggage was in the room waiting We enjoyed great cocktails during happy hour before going out for the evening There are great local restaurants all within walking distance from the hotel we ate at 100 Hoxton Breakfast the following morning was good quality with plenty of choice We looked out from the 16th floor over the sights of London and St Pauls Cathedral It was a relaxed affair there was no rush for us to eat and get out I would say this hotel is great value for money and would highly recommend if you want somewhere special to stay in London I really look forward to staying again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: This hotel is trying too hard to reach the 5 stars level but it looked more like a 4 stars hotel I would not rate it more than 4 stars There were a few things which we disliked 1 the bed was very uncomfortable there is an extra mattress put on top of the 2nd mattress which is very bad for the back and very wavy we had to remove it in order to sleep 2 the idea of having ipads to control the lights is stupid especially since the ipads are always on at night they are showing the clock and cannot be turned off so again very difficult to sleep with the ipads light next to your head at night
Positive_Review: The location was good close to the metro stop Old Street

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Sadly the technology lets this hotel down They seem to be going through quite a problem with it I ve stayed twice now and it s been a major problem both times TV didn t work properly this time and didn t work at all the last time i stayed Had to move rooms because the room controls for lights etc on the panel in the wall didn t work There are no normal light switches the whole room is controlled dependent on wall panel technology and bedside tablets ipads which also suffers from a time lag when you tap it and is not user friendly Staff were fantastic in trying to compensate for the inconvenience but there is sadly only so much they can do even the IT maintenance guys They outsource the hotels TV and room controls etc and it is this company that needs to be changed sort it out sacked

Positive_Review: Welcome drink on a Saturday arrival Very comfy bed and good block out curtains Amazing spa and pool with nice touches of heated floors and chilled water in jug at spa Great city views from 16th floor bar Walking distance from tube station

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Using the spa with approx 7 people taking constant selfies and photos in the spa area It s quite a small area so we were aware we were in quite a number of their pictures in our swimwear It was really uncomfortable We didn t realise until afterwards that they are banned but despite staff walking through constantly they never told anyone to put them away Also I stayed two weeks in a row The first week there was no robes in the room The second quite a lot of the toiletries which had been there the first week weren t there Plus we had to wait 30 mins after check in for our room and it still wasn t even ready We had to be allocated a different room
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a good location for bars and restaurants The staff were lovely

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The shower could ve been a tiny bit more powerful but it was alright And maybe a birthday message from the hotel would ve been nice on the day of my birthday Didn t think I d have to request it
Positive_Review: Just about everything The bed was the most comfortable thing I d ever felt

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The TV didn t have many of the basic channels also the connection kept going The pool facilities was too busy full of young people making too much noise Also we had a treatment in the spa the room they put us in was near the reception which was no problem however the amount of noise the staff were making outside the door laughing i didn t get a chance to enjoy my treatment
Positive_Review: The room was amazing the bed was one of the most comfortable i ve slept in The equipment they have to control the facilities in the rooms are fabulous you don t even need to step out of the bed to close the curtains

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast at the hotel is disappointing yet expensive However there are plenty of eateries nearby
Positive_Review: The hotel is very nice new and modern All the facilities were great Everything in the room is controlled by a pad even opening the curtains A complimentary phone is provided giving free calls including international calls and web browsing You can take it out with you too to act as a city guide with maps Fab To add to that a glass of prosecco and chocolate dipped strawberries are provided as you arrive It is located near Old Street underground station only two stops away from Kings Cross ST Pancras

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Both check in on Friday afternoon was pretty chaotic with only 2 people initially on the desks and several concierges asking you questions adding to the confusion Suggest more reception staff and fewer concierges Saturday morning check out looked dreadful with 15 20 in multiple queues but the team did move this through well to be fair At the moment the hotel is next to a building site Due to excellent double glazing you don t hear much but our room on 15 floor looked almost eye to eye with the crane driver Something to be cautious about in the morning
Positive_Review: The huge rain water head shower in the bathroom was amazing and easy to use and the wash basin is designed with space all the way round it to put out toiletries and wash bags etc which so often is a problem in newer hotels Very quiet and comfortable hotel despite the building site next door and the 12 noon check out is welcome at the weekend The cocktail selection in Tonic and Remedy was brilliant with some fascinating twists on standards like Manhattans and Aperol Spritz and the service in the bar was extremely professional and friendly

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The digital TV channels remote control were not talking to each other very well
Positive_Review: Very modern fresh feel Staff very friendly and helpful The continental breakfast option is served in a cool lounge looking over the roof tops

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Lack of hooks in the spa facilities for robes and towels cocktail selection in the bar were limited
Positive_Review: Spa facilities robes and slippers in the room Under floor heating in the bathroom

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This was my first time coming to this hotel and I must say it is fantastic when I was coming in to check in there was a queue but the staff apologies and gave as a glass of champagne I didn t have to wait long and the check in was very fast When I saw my room I was very happy with everything look good and the bed was so Comfortable unfortunately I didn t go to the spa so I couldn t experience how it was Overall this hotel is beautiful and amazing and I will definitely come back here with my panther and try out the spa and thank you and your staff for Making us feel welcome I had the best weekend ever

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Pillows could had been firmer covers were all over the place room was too hot and the spa is always fully booked when the whole trip was for the spa but disappointed
Positive_Review: The design of the building

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The wait for toast could ve been better they should let customers do their own Also the mushrooms and tomatoes should be kept away from the bacon and sausages as people were using the same tong to pick everything However because everything else was superb this was not enough to downgrade the hotel in general
Positive_Review: The bed was amazingly comfortable I felt like booking an extra day The spa facilities the hot stone massage again amazing The hotel was gorgeously looking nice bright very modern The staff were very friendly right from the moment I stepped in the concierge offered to take my bag bubbly was offered at the desk the gentleman that checked me in gave me a nice room on the 15th floor because it was my husband s birthday All in all it was a very enjoyable stay my husband loved his surprise

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: On this occasion there were not enough toiletries in the bathroom No conditioner at all And no macaroons to great me But this is very minor and all I can find fault with
Positive_Review: I enjoyed everything about my stay and regularly return to Montcalm The spa is wonderful staff courteous and the beds super comfy

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Lack of parking but it is London and the TV was a little bit on the slow side but nothing that would detract from the stay at all really
Positive_Review: Very well presented good location and very polite welcoming staff Room was very clean and in room facilities were appreciated Bed was very comfortable with the array of lighting options very useful

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I normally go to Montcalm for relaxation and luxury with great value for money I love to spend time in the spa this time round I took my son I booked via booking com and did not see anything in the comments about Spa age limits I have been to montcalm before and seen children in the pool so thought this was not an issue on the first night of our stay my son and I went swimming he is such a good boy aged 10 the next day we went to go and use the spa and I was told he was not allowed to enter when asked his age I told them 10 they told me he was under age This was very disheartening as my main reason for stay is to use the spa facilities my son was upset as he was allowed to use the spa the night before with no questions asked I think the hotel need to be more clear on there spa limitations especially for people who travel to this hotel as families
Positive_Review: I love Montcalm and I stay there often This time round I had the best room ever it was bigger than ones I have had before with amazing view and huge windows I love the spa as this is the highlight of my stay

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: The room was immaculate spacious and well equipped I had the best night sleep the bed was so comfy The hotel itsself had stunning decor throughout I loved that we got free access to the spa the spa was small but beautiful and enough It was really lovely All the staff were so welcoming and friendly they couldn t have been anymore helpful We highly recommend this hotel and we ll definitely be going back in the future

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Though the high tech gadgets were kind of cool they didn t always function that well I struggled quite a bit with setting the air con to the right temperature and turning off the lights and I m normally quite tech savvy A big issue was that the display on the various gadgets wasn t very sensitive responsive Still a cool idea though
Positive_Review: The bed was amazing and the decor was a real plus

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: They have introduced a smartphone in the room with free Wi Fi etc to take out with you during the day great idea However it was not charged when we got to the room and did not work once charged Brilliant idea if the handset was functional
Positive_Review: Room with tablet control is amazing and spa facilities are lovely

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Rude reception staff On arrival I was asked Why are you here in a very unfriendly manner The whole check in process was cold and uncomfortable
Positive_Review: Really lovely room and gorgeous spa area

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Only one thing the wardrobes were very dark and could have done with some lights
Positive_Review: The hotel exceeded our expectations it was fantastic Location was great Will definitely stay here again and already have been recommending to friends

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The upstairs restaurant had a very limited menu ended up going out for dinner but theres plenty of choice nearby
Positive_Review: Extremely comfortable bed and such a clean luxury room with a lovely bath

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The room has a lot of shiny black surfaces that show every mark and fingerprint In general I don t like rooms with lots of shiny black because you can see all the previous guests marks No matter how good housekeeping is at the cleaning job its impossible to get black shiny surfaces perfectly clean The room service was a problem at first with a guy on the phone who was absolutely clueless The room service menu was in transition so 4 things on the menu were no longer offered But the head chef could not have been nicer and corrected the problem pronto Very nice guy
Positive_Review: The suite was nice and quite large The view was great The bed was very comfortable The special disco colour lighting was funny but of course I tried every colour The hotel staff was very nice and in general helpful and accomodating But I felt some of them are still in training The concierge for example recommended a restaurant in the neighbourhood that had just 2 stars on Yelp Not a good call on his part All said I would return to the M

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everywhere was exceptionally clean and modern The spa was beautiful We were warmly welcomed both days and couldn t be more thankful for a lovely birthday stay

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: no onsite parking They have a few spaces at the side of the hotel which are always taken There are two ncp car parks but only one is 24 hour which is the one we had to use and was 55 a night
Positive_Review: Hotel overall was exceptional You get champagne on arrival and the concierge is very helpful The hotel room had gadgets that allowed you to turn off change lights tv etc and bathroom had under floor heating Very clean and modern

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The spa changing facilities females were too small no hooks to put your stuff not enough benches no one cleaning up towels on the floor excess water everywhere no mirrors other than by the sinks This is one and only critisism of our stay
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly and attentive facilities really good room was amazing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The property s decor was very modern and great to look at and the facilities were great The bed was very comfortable to sleep in I would stay again Overall i was very impressed

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Our pillows were too soft for our liking and the waterfall shower wasn t that powerful
Positive_Review: Hotel was very modern and staff were very helpful and friendly We used the spa which is open to all guests Our mattress was extremely comfortable and breakfast was delicious

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: silly touch screens instead of lightswitches and couple of bits of poor service let the place down slightly still liked and would consider a return if necessary
Positive_Review: nice room overall ideally located for our particular needs on this trip

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: All good aside of Expensive cocktails
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely helpful especially the general manager Facilities excellent Rooms exceptional and cleanliness great Cocktails a little too pricey so maybe look at options of promotions so that guests stay in the bar

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Room 1519 smells a tad like old cigarette smoke which the air freshener did not completely mask There was a weird incessant thump thump thump noise in the room when I stayed there
Positive_Review: Location is good Guys at concierge are very friendly and helpful Room is fairly spacious modern and well appointed

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The tv could have had better signal but otherwise everything was great
Positive_Review: The spa was amazing so was the bed All the staff were friendly and helpful Prosecco on arrival and departure was great I loved it all even the room was very upgraded

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast buffet is not what I am used to in hotels that level and price
Positive_Review: Size of rooms stylish fit out great SPA and very good sky view restaurant and frindly staff

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast could have been a bit better and not have taken the juice away first when tidying up as I wanted something to drink just before I left breakfast
Positive_Review: The hospitality of the staff in making the weekend special for my partners birthday and were very accommodating

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: On arrival the receptionist was rather rude he made a fuss about payment as though my card had declined when in fact his wireless keypad was losing signal and the transaction was made several times
Positive_Review: Gym and leisure facilities were lovely

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: There are several missing tiles in the steam room Not a good look Internet was often slow odd for a tech hotel We put the clean room sign on twice in one day but housekeeping never came Soap dish in room 407 chipped in 3 places and clearly needs to be replaced but hasn t Brightness level on TV way too dark The heat produced by the mini bar is quite high and tends to warm up the snacks on the shelf on top of it melting those made with chocolate Temperature controls on the bathroom panel very confusing The tablets and room control panels in the room were laggy and often unresponsive If your hotel claims to specialise as a tech hotel it needs to work flawlessly The Eccleston Square Hotel near Victoria where we stayed 3 years ago has mastered the use of in room technology It is better integrated and you can do many more things from your in room tablet Maybe time for a research trip M Hotel
Positive_Review: Excellent value for money For international travellers there is a smartphone you can take with you with data included to help you navigate and make the most of the city Location in zone 1 London 3 mins away from a tube station Check in time is at 2 and check out is at 12 This is exceptionally good for a large hotel Most hotels need 3 4 hours turnaround instead of 2 Nice sky lounge on top floor with lovely views Big TV in room Absolutely 0 light pollution from curtains Pillows very comfortable No noise complaints even with a vast amount construction going on next door Hotel is new so most things are in good condition Beds huge even in entry level rooms Large sized rooms well above average for London Room service very fast Gentleman in charge of downstairs bar extremely friendly and knowledgeable Thank you for a great stay Would definitely stay here again and would recommend to others

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: staff were polite but could have been more friendly
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfy and the room was to a very high standard very clean and very modern would definitely recommend and will return

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Although the tablets were cool and modern they didn t turn off properly at night so it took a bit longer to get to sleep at night Also heating took a while to heat up but when it was it was great
Positive_Review: Everything was clean we loved the spa facilities and the room was cool using the tablets to operate everything and the bed was really comfy Staff are always on hand if you need anything Overall our stay was amazing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable Breakfast choice was good and tasty Staff were very polite and helpful We only stayed one night and didn t get chance to enjoy the facilities We would stay here again though in the future

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Gadgets in the room were a little slow at working wifi wasn t the best
Positive_Review: Lovely and very helpful staff Clean and comfortable and very smart A lovely stay

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: That our room was not ready at 15 36 When check in was at 14 00 It was disappointing to know that I had paid from 14 00 12 00 and my room was not ready and we was told we had to wait 30 mins Very disappointed Had to call for the manager who was able to facilitate a room however he just authorised a room change and walked off without apologising Customer service we did not expect to experience here
Positive_Review: The spa area and the up to date technology in the rooms

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Music in the room would be nice to have port available to hook up my phone to play music but tbh the staff got me speaker dock So it wasn t actually problem at all
Positive_Review: The room was spoitless and clean it had all the modern gadgets no light switches everything controlled with master control pad And the staff were more than happy to help show me how to work them

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I stayed 4 or 5 times at this hotel each time something shampoo water etc is missed out in the room the check in is very lengthy at the reception
Positive_Review: Location pool

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything was wonderful right from our welcome with a glass of prosecco the frielndly helpful staff and the perfectly equipped and comfy room The location is perfect for exploring Shoreditch The added bonus cakes fruit and balloons for the birthday boy delivered with a smile Only wish wed booked for longer to make use of the spa Will just have to go back

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The hospitality My booking went wrong with M by Montcalm and they moved me to this hotel We were given a free bar an upgrade and also complimentary breakfast in the morning It was nice for an mistake to be rectified so beautifully Thank you x

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I was unhappy about the system not being able to connect to my phone to play music but besides this it was perfect Still worth it
Positive_Review: The pool facilities and spa were perfect Room was great exactly what you d expect of that standard and staff are extremely polite

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything was fantastic especially the incredibly comfortable beds The staff were amazing and really looked after us The hotel is a quiet oasis in the centre of the city We are local and decided to shut ourselves away with use of the spa Great views of the city too Highly recommend

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I think a Continental Breakfast could be included in the price I know it s central London and everything is on another scale wrt cost but a glass of juice some coffee and a crosient wouldn t break the budget In any case there is a really good Pret a Manger 15m from the entrance
Positive_Review: Great hotel modern clean with high tech bedrooms befitting London s Silicon Roundabout Lots of facilities pool Spa etc My visit was connected with Moorfields Eye Hospital which is directly across the road so location could not be better for my purposes

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Made a special request on my booking and hotel did not provide No toothpaste in bathroom View was construction site
Positive_Review: I liked the technology in the room and the different light settings

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: One family friend travelled hours to meet us Left a message at reception he was in the area After leaving the hotel 2 weeks later we found out they never gave us the message
Positive_Review: The wifi was top notch easy to access and ultra fast

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The chairs in the bar area are trendy but not the most comfortable The dining room had chipped tables and breakfast was self service not quite high star expectation We did not appreciate a service charge being added on the bar tab but the option to take this off was taken away from us as they charged our card BEFORE printing off the itemised bill If food is NOT being served in the bar in the evening then menus etc should be removed from the tables Our room had an interconnecting door and we could hear the neighbours and their TV
Positive_Review: The location was good

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Made to feel a little uncomfortable when asking about the pool spa facilities with a child in tow Also wasn t able to get a table at Tonic and Remedy which was a bit of shame as it was our son s birthday and bar staff restaurant staff not very friendly
Positive_Review: A great high tech high spec hotel Lot s of great facilities nice and close to the tube

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The only thing that wasn t good about my stay was check in Somewhere along the line booking com had missed a trick and not shared my booking with the M by Montcalm reservations team Because of this it took 30 minutes to check in which made me late to the birthday dinner I was attending around the corner Also the heating was a bit tricky to get my head around I don t think the under floor heating worked in my room
Positive_Review: Everything was honestly fantastic

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Room service was poor they rarely answered the phone and then offered us a 45 minute wait for a salad at an off peak time We gave up on it in the end
Positive_Review: The bed was exceptionally comfy and the room was huge and very clean The spa was lovely

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: A welcome book in the room with instructions not a techy couple so took a while to work everything out

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Mirror in room the rest of my party had full length mirrors 1206 doesn t have one
Positive_Review: Really comfy beds luxurious rooms spa area Helpful and friendly staff

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: When I arrived at the hotel it seemed as if they had overbooked for that evening as they asked if I would move to a different hotel As my friends were staying at the M I was not keen to move and so the position of my room was not so great right by the elevators
Positive_Review: The room was nicely decorated with a big tv The bed was very comfortable and I really enjoyed used the tablets to open and close the curtains and change the mood lighting

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good even though we had to ask for milk more tea coffee toast and when we got there we wee told that we didn t have breakfast even though I had already spoken to reception and was told the same and then the ladie said yes we ok to have breakfast now she had checked so was a bit embarrassing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Didn t try the breakfast but for everything we did try couldn t fault it
Positive_Review: Going to go with the recommended here the bed was definitely like a fluffy cloud The lighting in the bedroom was fun and made you really feel comfortable without it being too bright and in your face Under floor heating for the bathroom just yes

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The iron in the room leaked on my clothes it was broken However I called concierge and they replaced immediately
Positive_Review: The hotel was amazing very clean and extra confortable beds I proposed to my girlfriend on this trip to which I gave a heads up to the hotel They went above and beyond to make our stay special and even upgraded us to a better room Ive stayed in many hotels across London but I couldn t recommend this hotel enough We very much look forward to returning on our next trip to London

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent friendly and very helpful staff at reception room very comfortable Very nice room especially for London standards Perfect location for the Hip part of town

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Room was a bit cold and controls didnt seem to heat it up much
Positive_Review: Overall was lovely bathroom and room technology was 1st class Super fast wifi in all areas Excellent breakfast which was brought to our room as well

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: the room was excellent staff attentive and helpful gave us complimentary cake and bubbles as it was my wife s 50th birthday location fab 3 mins from tube

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Very high tech Probably due to our age but we struggled to get the TV to work and also the lights turning them off was an interesting experience providing us with an exciting light show when we were trying to switch them off
Positive_Review: The bathroom and size of the bedroom were good Breakfast was nothing to write home about and the coffee was fairly uninteresting Staff were mostly very friendly

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I paid 75 for parking which was ridiculous I think it s a big shame and downfall that parking isn t provided The spa was average The steam room wasn t working
Positive_Review: The hotel room was amazing and I was very happy

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No complimentaries in the room tea biscuits or water fully booked spa with no warning this would be the case
Positive_Review: The hotel was gorgeous very impressive tech

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: For a hotel that charges over 300 per night I was disappointed by several things Most importantly the king sized bed had two mattresses both were of exceptionally poor quality but one of them had s massive hole in the middle after my boyfriend and I sat on it to watch TV for 30 minutes and neither of us are big sized people We couldn t use that side of the bed at all and ended up sleeping on the other side We did not have a good night s sleep which was a key reason I had been willing to pay this amount of money in the first place Secondly the room had no slippers or dressing gowns I d expect this to be standard for a hotel in this price range Lastly the hotel has an elaborate electronic system to control lighting hearing curtains and the TV Impressive at first look until you realize that it s very hard to use and it s impossible to get a light or temperature setting that s actually comfortable It would have been far better if this money had been invested in good quality mattresses
Positive_Review: Spa facilities are nice as was the warm welcome by the receptionist however three showers were insufficient and after waiting 10 minutes to use one after my swim I gave up and went back to my room wrapped in towels as the spa didn t have robes available

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Our room wasn t clean after the 1st night we stayed 2 nights Bathrobes were missing and never arrived We had to show the same credit card used to book the room it was a gift by another person we had to call him over embarrassing
Positive_Review: It s really 2 minutes far from the tube station

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Well the tv s didn t look bright enough maybe because of the adde frame to it
Positive_Review: The look and feel was very impressive Modern day technology on point Cleanliness can also be mentioned

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I thought the staff were a bit rude They were standing at the desk laughing and holding a piece of paper up over their faces so no one could see what they were talking about Made me feel really uncomfortable however I was there simply for a nights stay so the staff didn t bother me
Positive_Review: I loved the rooms They were so so lovely The location was good for us as we were going out in shoreditch

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The staff were not very welcoming they don t understand English Rude restaurant manager on ground floor went for dinner at 22 30 he stopped using at the bottom of the stairs as we were entering the restaurant to tell us have grazing at the bar he didn t even allow us to enter before telling us that The receptionist was rude at checkout in I ask what time was breakfast and which floor was steam room she responded I told you previously so rude She had a European accent most staff were European even that restaurants manager no courtesy at all they all need customer service training Upon entering the room is observed that the bathroom floor was soiled I rang them they send house keeper up who told me it s damaged tile I ask to move to another room However after I had move to the next room went to the steam room upon return the keys could not open the door once again had to take it back to front desk to reprogrammed The hotel has too many high tech with no ambience also high tech that is inadequate television doesn t work properly I was happy it was one night stay I will always use hotel with English speaking staff who are very courteous and professional I paid for a service not to be treated in that manner
Positive_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Showers in the spa are broken with lime scale Only 1 towel provided in the room shower room We requested a high floor room but were given floor 3 the room wasn t very nice although they assured us it was an upgrade it was very small and cramped The staff were cold and stand offish We informed them that we did t like the room and it looked much smaller then the website they replied that the images on the website are only a guide Which I think translates to they show larger sample rooms then what s actually on offer
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Small power cut but we didn t let it effect our time
Positive_Review: Staff were nice especially one gentleman who gave us a late seat at breakfast and really helped up out I don t know his name he seemed like a bar restaurant manager with a French accent Really took care of us

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast was abit chaotic First morning it took about 5 requests for coffee but this improved
Positive_Review: Bed very comfortable Room nice Electronics lighting etc a bit baffling but we got there in the end Lifts good spa and gym good

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The fact that we were automatically charged a discretionary service charge of 12 5 for a self service English breakfast already priced at 22 per person The most expensive English breakfast I have encountered in a London hotel We did have the service charge refunded on request
Positive_Review: The room was excellent and very modern One of the best we have stayed in The bed was extremely comfortable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The bed was lumpy on my first night due to the mattress topper I asked for it to be change and it was done almost immediately

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Cleaning women every day forgat to add shampoo or towel she manage to forget even her cleaning equipments in the room on our suitcase Two mornings fire alarm went on very loud and twice all lights went off in the room nothing was working very modern sistem but they corect it very quick
Positive_Review: Nice hotel modern room nice personal at the recepcion

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The fines in the rooms was down And staff took too long to answer which was annoying plus there s a lot of workers there that can t speak English which was annoying
Positive_Review: Took my partner for he s birthday he was impressed from the rooms to the food And we ve rebooked to go back Defo worth the money

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast was very busy and hectic but food was nice Sound quality was not clear on the tv in our room

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: On this occasion I decided to drive 210 miles when I arrived 9am rush hour time the parking space had been coned off so I could not stop outside the hotel to unload baggage With no option I had to park in the taxi bay whilst I ran in to concierge when I returned a taxi driver had been blaring his horn at my girlfriend so it was quite a stressful arrival When I called to enquire about the bath butler service I was offered a room with a bath which I accepted But when I arrived in the room the bath wasn t really big enough to really enjoy the bath butler service PLUS we didn t have the usual amazing walk in shower Also we were unable to use the upstairs bar due to a private party I STILL THINK ITS A GREAT HOTEL BUT IT WASN T AS WONDERFUL THIS TIME AS I KNOW IT CAN BE

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Staff are totally incompetent Faulty Towers has nothing on this place I endured a catalogue of errors including money taken from my account not once but 3 times The net result was that they totally ruined my birthday The clearly don t care because i m not the first to complain about staff competency I was also less than impressed to be staying at a hotel in London on a Saturday and being asked for my last drinks order just before midnight When I questioned why it was so early I was snapped at by the rude little man who frankly was a shade off aggressive I had another stay booked for March but I will be cancelling it

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Pillows were not comfortable so had a terrible sleep The water from the shower had very little pressure even when adjusted to the maximum The all so tech gadget that runs the lights and air con etc froze and crashed a few times so I couldn t even turn the light out or put my air con on The tv signal kept on scrambling so I couldn t even watch a movie
