Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Live in north west London booked for a romantic night close to the action Awful check in experience ruined our stay I had asked the hotel to allow my partner to check in as she was arriving before me via booking com unfortunately the gentleman on the desk couldn t help her he said he couldn t see the note fair enough but you have my card and you have me on the phone with the booking number etc it s a one night booking and you have the power to charge the card anyway as you would if I hadn t turned up I rushed from the other side of the city only to find my girlfriend sat in the lobby almost an hour later perhaps the hotel could have given her a tea or somewhere to change for our evening out When I talked to the lady who was now on the desk she was baffled as to why the person my partner had dealt with while I was also available on the phone had not just charged the card on file and let her into the room All together the knock on effect was that I had to conduct my business activities planned for Friday afternoon on Saturday meaning that we didn t get to enjoy the facilities we missed our evening reservation at a restaurant in Hoxton and my treat for my other half was essentially ruined by a lack of competency from the man on the front desk The hotel made absolutely no attempt to try to make things right You will see from my other reviews that I am balanced and fair in my feedback
Positive_Review: The room was clean one of the cleanest I have ever seen and comfortable The Hotel s location is great

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: TV not good kept streaming and freezing up on the screen Very disappointing considering all the other hi tech stuff The TV has to work Other than that I couldn t fault the hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: My room was not ready until 2 so we went and had something to eat and went back at 2 then it still wasn t ready they said they would come to us at the bar when it was no one did we had to go to the desk about 4 times to ask for them to keep saying it was in progress annoying when we had tickets to go somewhere and needed to get ready and freshen up ended up rushing about and been 5 mins late
Positive_Review: The tablets beside the bed and the spa was excellent

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The check in could have been quicker but it was busy so it was slightly understandable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: However this time the attention I received was very poor The check in took very long I asked for a room with separate beds and they asked to wait for them to prepare the room accordingly they proposed us to go to the spa in the meantime we decided to visit London and at the end of the day when I went to my room I realized that they have done nothing The beds were still not separated I called the reception and they told me that my room didn t allow have separate beds I asked then to change room and they told me that the hotel was full at breakfast the waiter was too distracted I had to constantly call him to bring us the coffee the toasts last time I stayed that was done proactively and the clients didn t have to have their hand raised all the time Some of the touch screen on my room don t work which was quite uncomfortable to switch on off lights The spa was not very clean and smelled humidity and the cleaning of my room was also very poor I was recommending this hotel to my work colleagues but definitely I will not recommend this hotel anymore
Positive_Review: It s not the first time that I stay in this hotel I like the spa and the confort of the rooms location is also good close to the subway and a lot of bus lines

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Very poor meal in the restaurant service average at best when we said our meal was just ok due to very tough steak and poor description of the meal we received a blank look no apology The couple on the next table had the same problem as seafood wasn t listed and the customer was allergic Food very inferior and over priced compared with some amazing places in London
Positive_Review: convenience of hotel to moorfields

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The android tablets in the room used to control the lights heating curtains etc I want to put this as a positive feature but sadly they were terrible to use very slow response and kept crashing Heating was hard to control would either get too hot or cold and couldn t just choose a temperature and let the room maintain it had to keep changing whether I wanted it heated or cooled every hour or so The TV was very unclear slow to respond and kept crashing every 3 4 minutes became completely unusable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: We went for brunch to the top floor restaurant and they had absolutely nothing for a vegan and weren t even apologetic My friend asked for avocado on toast but everything had cream and butter in I would have expected someone to run downstairs to Sainsbury s for an avocado
Positive_Review: Check in is quite long and busy but the free glass of prosecco was a lovely touch We were here for a bridal shower and they sent up a free bottle of prosecco to our room

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Technology in room was poor lighting was slow to respond to the touch pad which was frustrating The Information delivering aspect of the TV led nowhere and as there was no other way of finding out about the spa dining options etc we resorted to googling Just give us an in room brochure for god s sake The staff tried hard but lacked training On arrival we were given a room to discover a different name on the room key folder On informing staff this we waited in the room to be told what to do receiving a phone call to say there was a computer glitch Luckily we didn t avail ourselves of the facilities as another couple arrived and let themselves in the room shocking for them and us On arriving at the breakfast area we were not offered tea or coffee for ages This happened both mornings Despite our full English breakfast being included in the price we paid I was told that if I wanted porridge that would be 7 extra Yes I could have had ham cheese pastries as well as cooked breakfast which looked very nice but the only cereals on offer were bran flakes and special K I then waited 10 minutes after asking 2 staff members for a cereal bowl argh Confusingly 15 floors above us was another breakfast area for those receiving Continental breakfast again not initially explained by staff or room info Unfortunately although this hotel has the potential to be great it was not good enough for five stars and we won t return the quest for the perfect London hotel continues
Positive_Review: The room was lovely good comfy bed great shower etc The hotel is in a great location for enjoying East London and still being accessible for the West End and South London which is what we were looking for when visiting family in London

Negative_Review: The media station didn t work in our room and nobody came to help us even though we asked 4 times One staff member didn t even seem to know what I was taking about when I told her it was nt working Not ideal when it s part of the reason you booked the hotel We also got asked 3 times if we wanted to move to their new hotel in a different location which we didn t and it became annoying being asked I just wanted the room spec to be what it is described as and for things to be working or fixed

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: This is a personal preference but the bed was so soft it was uncomfortable What really put me out was that everything was controlled by touch pads There were several in the room that glowed at night enough to bother me Furthermore these did not work properly when I arrived and were only fixed after calling maintenance who restarted the system twice On my third night the power completely went out only in my room and since I couldn t call down I went downstairs and then couldn t get back in the room since the card reader didn t work either Lastly I didn t like paying up front for the entire stay This didn t give me a choice if I wanted to switch hotels or if I was staying with a friend I did book a refundable room

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Service was poor A number of times we ordered something to the room or at the table and it never came Some of the dos facilities were also not working and the men s changing rooms folded every time anyone used the shower When I mentioned this to the staff I was told this was ok and it was normal

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The electronic control tablet is hanged out twice during my stay
Positive_Review: Actually it was a great experience That was our first time to hear about or try M By Montcalm Surprisingly the hotel facilities particularly the space of room modern decoration and electronic control system quality of food in the room service and restaurants were amazing The staff are so kind particularly Cristina from the front desk and Conceirge guys were so kind The cleanliness was perfect The cost of stay equals the provided services I just want to say Thank you very much for all people there

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Small niggle but the pillows were very uncomfortable would benefit from providing a pillow menu like some other hotels or a least a couple of other spare pillows to accommodate guest needs The touchscreen tablets weren t the most responsive things in your universe which made simple tasks like turning off the lights rather taxing Also lots of building work going on next door so not the greatest immediate view but we could see beyond to the Gerkin from our window As I said only silly niggles
Positive_Review: Very modern and impressive building High tech room with features like lights mood lighting curtains and media centre controlled by touchscreen tablets Mobile phone provided for use whilst out and about in London if required Lovely spa facilities Fab views of the city from the bar restaurant Cool location in Shoreditch out of the hustle and bustle of central London but within walking distance of great restaurants and places of interest such as Spitalfields and Brickyard Markets Excellent value for London

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Positive_Review: Very well connected by the underground Verry friendly staff they help me with the map explanation underground routes to print the boarding pass and to keep my luggage by the end of the day after the check out The comfort and cleaning are at very high level

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: We were charged for breakfast when it should have been included in the price Staff were reminded on two occasions at check in and when placing our order We received an unsatisfactory response to our queerie regarding the extra charge and await a response to our reply e mail sent over 2 weeks ago It doesnt look like we will be getting a refund
Positive_Review: Lovely Hi tech rooms

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I asked for a drink at the bar was told to sit and my order would be taken I paid 11 50 for one drink plus another 2 table service The most expensive single drink I have ever had Later on in the evening I phoned room service to request an ice bucket about half an hour I called back down to cancel it as it had taken so long On arrival at reception the guy who booked us in wasn t really very friendly he couldn t even bring himself to smile on the website our room apparently had an aroma box which we were able to choose a smell for our room whatever that was but when we asked the guy at the desk he didn t seem to know what we were asking about so we gave up The iPad type controls didn t seem to want to work in our room
Positive_Review: Fluffy carpets and super comfy bed Location was excellent

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: There was a disturbance outside our room at 1am one night due to a guest and staff member arguing about letting the guest into his room I felt this could have been dealt with at reception avoiding the need to argue outside our bedroom door Upon mentioning the disturbance when checking out of our hotel the staff member apologised and compensated us an amount for the inconvenience I was very impressed with the way this complaint was dealt with and would have no hesitation recommending this hotel
Positive_Review: Very modern hotel with great facilities and equipment in the rooms Staff were friendly and accommodating Location is great lots of nearby pubs and bars etc

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Overall amazing value for money However I was a little disappointed about the service I requested a room with a bath but didn t get this When we called reception the lady hung up I also phoned to ask for some more shampoo and again the lady at reception hung up on us Overall it was a lovely place but service needs to be improved

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The only things that let this hotel down is the staff We re rude on arrival and not very helpful tried to call reception four times during our stay because our iPad was not responding but nobody picked up Asked about a late check out was happy to pay more but the girl who served us just didn t seem to know anything said we could stay tell 2 but I was concerned so checked with another member of stuff who told us we had to call the next day All very strange to me that such a high rated hotel stuff have such poor knowledge skills and attitude

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I was lied at check in that a deposit would not be charged that only the pre booking on my credit card for the first nights stay would be charged and I paid the balance when I checked in However the hotel had charged the full stay on my credit card as well as blocked another full amount despite the booking being no deposit and me being assured that no deposit would be taken I get charged interest until hotel decides to release the money and it pisses me off that I wasn t told about this Otherwise good stay

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This was my second time coming back to the Hotel as me my partner love it so much It s such a good price you most defiantly get what you pay for An absolutely beautiful laid out room spa swimming pool open until 9PM Really good location also a nice get away if you want to relax esp by the spa all day it s perfect

Negative_Review: Apparently the pool is not for swimming just for walking inside breakfast was nice apart from the sausages could be more cooked Breakfast could do with more juice or smoothies considering it is 29 per head

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: 2 things 1 Wifi was a bit dodgy at times 2 A c via the tablet control was a bit delayed But both worked great for the most part Other than that amazing
Positive_Review: I booked this hotel last minute after an Airbnb fell through It is the best hotel I have stayed in anywhere and will be my new got in London Here are some reasons why Location Shoreditch is an awesome up and coming area of London surrounded by great food and a great night life Trendy hipster and authentic people abound Nespresso machine in room Free top line coffee in room each morning with biscuit Perfect after a Shoreditch night Fully automated room controlled by tablet All lights A C tv curtains are controlled by a tablet both at the front of the room and in your bed Forget to hit a light before getting in bed No worries Handy telephone provided Hotel provided a cell equipped with 3G capabilities to use around the city for free Amazing for international travelers trying to get around without data service beautiful facilities for good price The size of the room and bathroom and quality of all was amazing considering a price around 200 Incredible deal

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Ordered Room service the person who took my order sounded exasperated with me for confirming my order was correct
Positive_Review: All your staff were excellent apart from one

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: My partner and I had another lovely stay in M by Montcalm while we celebrated his birthday I let the hotel know in advance that it was a special occasion and when we arrived we found our room had been upgraded and lots of special touches added Adorable As normal our room was not only clean and comfy but huge too We re a big fan of the way everything can be controlled by the tablets and love how everything you could need is available in the room already We also made sure to take advantage of the pool and spa which is a really brilliant addition On top of that the hotel is in such a handy location meaning we were never far away from where we wanted to be We couldn t have been happier with our stay and will be back sooner than later

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Room service Not top notch but the hotel were very apologetic and made an amendment to my bill
Positive_Review: The architecture of the building is amazing I liked the fact that there was a pool and spa but didn t get up early enough to use it

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Old street underground being closed Can t fault the hotel at all
Positive_Review: Great staff very friendly Electric curtains were a nice feature The hotel is also an amazing building which added to the experience

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The fried breakfast was a little dry as it was buffet but hey no big deal I simply went back and got myself an extra delicious croissant
Positive_Review: We have stayed at quite a few hotels in London which were all very nice However M by Montcalm was by far the best I like to treat my partner to a London break every now and then but some hotels just feel wrong No matter how glorious they are for us it s all about how you feel M by Montcalm made us feel great Like meeting an old friend again We will definitely go back The staff were superb all round and upgraded our room simply because the room was available The room was great with fantastic views across London However I am really intreaged to see the views from the point at the front of the hotel Next time we visit we would like to stay two nights and eat in the hotels 17th floor restaurant as well as we did in Hoxton again The location is perfect for a young couple as its in the heart of trendy Shorditch with lively bars restaurants coffee shops and night clubs at your feet with luxury when you return back to the hotel Literally can not fault this hotel M by Montcalm is perfect

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel made extra effort as it was my birthday we got upgraded to a bigger suite and they decorated our room with birthday surprises Staff were really welcoming and helpful

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Check in took 10 minutes Last time I stayed at a Premier Inn it took 10 seconds and cost 10 of the price The room was connected via tablets and an Android powered interface none of it worked I couldn t have a shower when I arrived because I couldn t turn the bathroom light on An engineer was sent to fix it In the middle of the night it cut out again stopping the aircon and causing me a hot uncomfortable night s sleep There were no instructions on how to use the phone Reception didn t answer when I called Then when I finally got hold of them they didn t know if they offered a pressing service It s a real shame and somewhat ironic that the flagship hotel of London Tech City as they proudly brand their gowns can t provide technology that works To compound it all although admittedly not their fault there is a huge construction site next door and I was awoken at 9am on a Saturday by hammering and drilling Overall a very disappointing and expensive experience
Positive_Review: In theory this is a smashing hotel A gorgeous building and modern to a fault Unfortunately in reality it is a great concept badly executed The room service was excellent however

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: pre authorization on CC required 150GBP deposit which is ridiculous that s quite a lot converting to EUR or USD They also incorrectly charged my CC instead of my coworker for her pre authorization charges at the end of our stay without notifying me I had to call and escalate to a manager who finally helped and cleared up the problem but the front desk and first billing coordinator were not helpful Also rooms were stiflingly hot as were beds comforters so I did not sleep well the entire week I heard two other women in the elevator complaining about their room also thinking their heater must be broken in the on position Would consider staying again but would first call to ask about alternative bedding options

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Bar a little on the expensive side but there are loads of Bars near

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The pool should have more sits and the breakfast should be cheaper
Positive_Review: Bed was large and comfy the way how I could link my computer to the tv was excellent

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Small problems with room key not letting us in I returned about 9 keys by the end of my stay bathroom light in triple room stopped working in night expected as the hotel is so technical and everything controlled by ipad including lights and curtains It was a little strange to have an electrician in the room at 8am to fix the lights but we were given another room while he worked During our issues the staff were very helpful apologetic and professional I requested an Upgrade for breakfast for my party and this was granted Parking is an issue There was a maximum stay of 3 or 4 hours but it was really Expensive The night before was fine as we parked on a Sunday but moved the car to a pay and display bay on Monday morning Next time I wouldn t drive unless Saturday to Sunday but all of the above would not prevent me from returning I m not sure what standard double rooms are like I imagine they re quite plain as I think we were moved to one when we had the lighting issue My suite was plain but had all I needed so I can imagine a simple double would be even plainer I would recommend a club room as a minimum room as it pays due to the voucher and possibility of a free upgrade One of my favourite hotel stays and I stay in about 10 a year or maybe I was excited for my first girls night away
Positive_Review: Beautiful clean modern hotel with polite staff Beautiful place to to stay We booked a double room and a triple room Double room was upgraded to a king suite which was beautiful Both rooms had Hermes bathing products and robes Upon check in I had a call to the suite to ask if all was ok and was brought up 5 cupcakes and a bottle of alcohol maybe because I mentioned it was my birthday Also we were given a 20 Pound voucher per person per room to use in the casual lounge upstairs As there were 5 of us we spent nothing that night As we had fish and chips or burgers in the lounge fish and chips recommended When I looked at this hotel online I was not too sure about the location or facilities but you have to see it to believe it it is lovely Views are of the local city and mostly traffic but rooms and facilities were really good so views did not matter to me and I pay a premium for good views usually I went for the spa and it was lovely a small pool and jacuzzi but ample space for the people who visited Behind the pool is a dry steam room and wet steam room with showers I think there s also a gym which I didn t get the time to use There is a relaxation room in the spa area with a few lounge chairs I feel it was very Cosey and fresh cold water was available I would however say that me sister and I accidentally went into the mens Changing room as there is a faint Image of a man and a woman our bad I suppose Montcalm is really good overall and I loved it and I will return I originally found out about this hotel on a friends social media and instantly enquired about it Website doesn t do the hotel justice it s amazing As explained with the vouchers and upgraded breakfast we spent very little for our 1night stay

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: not that techy as hoped just having tablets in the room as controller doesnt mean it s techy Usability was poor
Positive_Review: well located clean friendly and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Every thing was fine Room was excellent and the toiletries were replenished

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was perfect so close to Old street underground station which was only a few stops from Euston and really close to Shoreditch for the bars and restaurants The staff were all super friendly helpful Loved all of the mod cons in the room the bed was so comfy I just wished I d known about the spa so I could have brought my swimming costume Hopefully I ll stay here next time I visit London so I can check it out

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Nothing major prices for room service were a little high but that s understandable as it s London city
Positive_Review: I m so happy to have booked this hotel had a fantastic stay The staff were really pleasant and helpful while checking me in The room was lovely extremely clean and well presented Everything is controlled on ipads which was really fun you could customize quite a bit with the lighting curtains and room temperature underfloor heating etc The bed was extremely comfortable and we both slept really well The bathroom was spotless and the shower was great the Elemis products were a nice extra The location was great too the underground is right outside and it s also cheap enough to get a cab after hours Overall you could really see the quality in the room from the full size hairdryer to the high quality selection of teas will definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: It s a fun hotel in a hip part of town but doesn t deserve 5 star rating We ve got the last minute deal via booking com The staff was friendly but we clearly caused a lot of problems They were unaware of the late check out for geniuses offer and obviously weren t taking our word for it it wasn t easy to find on the confirmation email but we managed in the end It was the longest check in process we ve ever had we ve cleared the transatlantic security quicker than that They made a copy of my passport an impression of my credit card the room was already paid for then we were asked to fill in the registration form and again for the the credit card and pin to pre authorise any spending on the card The design is great but then they clearly tried to save on builders everything is is assembled rather cheaply Bits don t necessarily match and there s glue visible between the parts of the design features The lights in a hallway and in in the club bar are flickering There was a 3 inch gap between blackout curtains and the wall next to the head board so you wake up at 7am with bright light shining onto your face whereas the rest of the room is relatively dark
Positive_Review: Location design

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: 1 Bathroom is large large sink large toilet large rainy shower place and handle easy to use sliding door nice water pressure available hot and cold water right away Whoever made the bathroom he paid attention to every detail I feel it is spacious just like home 2 Bed and pillows are extremely comfortable soft and clean Once I throw myself I go to sleep right away I feel I do not want to leave it 3 I do not have to talk about how nice is the automated touch system everybody did but what I liked the most is the cololrful mood light 4 Last but not the least two thumbs up for housekeeping and the quick room service You guys are doing great job Please keep going 5 Quick check in and check out

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: I told them it was my daughter s birthday and they filled our room with balloons and left cakes for her it made her day Such a lovely thing to do will definitely stay there again Pool is beautiful

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I was originally given the wrong room to the type I had booked It wouldn t have mattered but I specifically paid more for a twin room rather than a double The staff were quick to respond and move me but also did admit that all they do anyway is separate the beds which takes them about 5 minutes so that s what I paid extra for Interesting Also there were out of date crisps in our mini bar which in my opinion is totally unacceptable There was also an issue with a pre paid amount for extra drinks and food whilst you are there The bar told me I need to pay as I hadn t made this pre paid arrangement They even rang down to reception who confirmed this As it turned out I had paid and again it was their mistake When I complained about the above issues the guy on reception seemed to find it fairly amusing and smirked Not really 5 behaviour or service I m afraid
Positive_Review: The room was nice Very clean and spacious The shower was amazing The gym was better than most hotel gyms

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The bed was awful far too soft and no support plus the room was cold and did not warm up with the air con turned up to 24 degrees all night Too expensive for what it is

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: the tablets didn t work properly throughout my whole stay If everything is controlled by tech pieces you need to make sure that they work perfectly

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Beds weren t great Felt as if it was overpriced It isn t anywhere near as nice as its sister hotel at brewery city London Struggled with the tablets at first but they were a nice touch

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Fantastic hotel Excellent welcome Very friendly and attentive staff Beautiful pool spa facility Tremendous breakfast Great views from floor 15

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I booked this for a 40th birthday treat and it really didn t dissapoint We got upgraded to a junior suite on arrival with cakes and a balloon which was a nice surprise There was fresh water and fruit in the room The room was lovely The bed was so comfortable and the bathroom was spotless with an amazing rain shower Loved all the technology We did come back to our room one afternoon and the card to open the door wouldn t work but other than that no problems Breakfast was fantastic Such a lovely choice of food All the staff were very helpful and polite One of the best hotels I ve stayed in for a long time We also got engaged on my birthday so this made it an even extra special time for us which I will always associate with staying in this hotel

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: On arrival had a pint of Heineken and a glass of prosseco somewhat shocked at bill of over 19 there are far better bars close by that charge significantly less
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast is not great hardly and choice And not hot either there is no toast at the buffet have to ask the waiter so while ur waiting the food gets cold Had a drink at the sky bar did not know they added service charge onto the bill lucky i brought abit extra change out The area the hotel is in is not the best you can jump on the train if need be Would help if there was instructions for coffee machine in the room Also a speaker with usb ports but didnt have a clue how to work it
Positive_Review: Staff at the hotel are extremely friendly even just walking around u are greeted When we arrived we had rose petals and balloons in the room as it was a occasion Very nice touch Also macaroons Bottled water and fruit Spa area was very clean and there is a fridge where u can help your self to water and fruit Locker keys and towels are also given once down there A short time after arriving house keeping came round to see if we needed anything but we were fine Under Heating floor in the bathroom is nice but takes a while to get going The room is basically controlled by the tablet ours switched off but someone soon came to fix it

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Bar staff and staff in the restaurant were sometimes slow and inconsistent in their level is service The bar was table service but this was slow and frustrating and I would ve preferred to just go to the bar
Positive_Review: The reception staff were lovely and welcome and staff were generally attentive The rooms are lovely with lots of mod cons

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: 26 each for breakfast even in London that is a joke
Positive_Review: Spa pool And the technology in the rooms Also an arrival call from guest experience was lovely and they gave us cupcakes and wine as it was a special occasion

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Massage treatments expensive at 95
Positive_Review: Building structure is amazing Lots of bars within the hotel nice views Great food and they have games evenings on sundays Spa was beautiful too Hotel rooms full of tech TV and tablets for lights and curtains All technology based

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: It s annoying to have to go from the hot breakfast area back over to the bar area to get bread The fact that I have to be so ridiculously picky to find a negative should be an indication of how well our stay went
Positive_Review: Great staff very comfortable room bonkers looking building Good breakfast love the area

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No humidifier weak water pressure no fresh fruit veg in the breakfast wobbly desk in the room

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Stunning hotel in a perfect location Stayed in a club room was placed on the 15th floor which had amazing views of the city Staff were very friendly and helpful the room was clean and luxurious and the breakfast was yum I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting a stunning base in the centre of London you won t be disappointed

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Big unit over the tv causes a lot of glare on the screen due to extra layer of glass Can t see the point of it apart from it makes the tv look like a giant iPad
Positive_Review: Friendly staff great location for getting to Alley Pally and central London great high tech room with nesspresso coffee machine very bouncy carpets very clean

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Reservation made via Booking com with usual personal details submitted online and secured via the company Credit Card I was then asked for photographic ID during the Check in process When the receptionist was questioned on the need for ID she was unable to give me a reasoned argument and then suggested that it was just part of the process they had to follow A little concerning given the amount of personal data exchanged by simply checking in to that hotel I was then told that payment was required on arrival as the booking was secured via Booking com which was not a problem but I was then informed that I couldn t use my personal card because pre authorisation had already been made via the company card and which was taken prior to me even arriving at the hotel In addition After declining the 50 pre authorisation per night I was abruptly told that I could not use the mini bar My entire experience of the hotel was tainted within 15 20mins of arrival It is disappointing that the hotel cannot replicate their local competitors customer experience Perhaps less of a security grilling and more a warm welcome would be more appropriate
Positive_Review: Comfortable room with a view

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I thought 28 for breakfast was excessive so went around the corner and had a full English for 5 95 I also couldn t find anything in the room about wifi access or passwords etc for that price I expected this to be free and obvious
Positive_Review: I loved the touch controls in the room once I understood them

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I can t think of anything I didn t like
Positive_Review: The effort the staff made to make our anniversary special really made our stay they put balloons rose petals and macaroons in our room for us to enjoy The spa was lovely and very clean all the staff were friendly and wished us a happy anniversary The breakfast was great also a nice selection

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I was greeted by the staff and told to pay for my room upon arrival I do not think I have been asked for payment in advance usually a bill at the end of the stay Didn t make it feel very 5 I did not know that I would have to pay an additional 50 00 charge just in case I decided to eat or drink some items from the bar in my room I told them I did not intend to take anything from the mini bar nor eat at the hotel so therefore I did not want to pay I was then told the mini bar would be emptied and good enough someone came to empty it Not very trusting of your guests I wasn t made aware of this when booking the room

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I had lunch one day The restaurant was very quiet and the menu was limited Perhaps these things are related
Positive_Review: As on my previous visit the staff were pleasant helpful and welcoming That to me more than anything makes for a good hotel

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The staff let the experience down Their English wasn t good enough so I had to repeat myself everytime that I spoke to someone which grew really tiring The food at breakfast was good but the organisation of it was awful Staff didn t know who d been seated where spilt coffee over guests and I had to ask for some toast three times one morning With the right staff it could have been a perfect trip
Positive_Review: Facilities and rooms were amazing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: If you need to sleep in complete darkness take an eye mask The ipads on the wall which control the lights in the room glow at night also there s light bleeding in from the hallway and on the TV and clock so annoying if you struggle to sleep with lights on They take the payment for the room twice Once on booking com and once on arrival so be aware of this The release the payment 3 days after you check out
Positive_Review: The room was lovely and the spa facilities were great You get a robe and slippers plus all the essentials you need The coffee machine was a nice touch and the view across London was awesome The shape of the building is so unusual and the gin bar downstairs is also amazing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: There was nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: Everything The decor the style the amazing staff The birthday cake they put in our room complimentary The best nights sleep I have ever had All the extras in the room My partner was so impressed with the tablet controlled curtains opening and the size of the tv The bathrobes and slippers A great price for a central London 5 star hotel so close to an underground station We were at the shard in 10 minutes

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: One member of staff that we checked in with was very Unhelpful and very grumpy clearly didn t want to be there His english wasn t great and didn t tell us where to go for breakfast what time it finished etc maybe I should of asked other than that cant fault the place
Positive_Review: Excellent facilities room was amazing touch screen gadgets are cool look after baggage even after you check out I know some hotels can be funny about that breakfast was amazing lots of variety and friendly waiters waitresses 2 3 min walk from Tube Lots of pubs clubs local for a 5 star for tghis price I will be going back again Thank you

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The mattress topper was smaller than the mattress the pillows were too soft The room hadn t been cleaned thoroughly there were nuts under the bed dust on the desk grime around the shower base These are only minor complaints we have already booked our return stay
Positive_Review: Loved the technology there was a wide variety of soft drinks alcohol snacks in the mini bar The coffee machine was a nice surprise

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Just parking facilities would be great
Positive_Review: Facilities and staff were great and excellent room facilities room was everything you needed for a good nights sleep

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The tech in the rooms played up yet again on this my second visit Why not just have a normal light switch
Positive_Review: The location close to Old Street station the trendy Shoreditch is perfect with free on street parking right outside the hotel on weekends

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The curtain was broken in our room and would not close properly I had to ring down for our luggage as this was not in our room We had a full English Breakfast included in the price and when we went to the restaurant on Sunday Morning a lady member of staff told us we had not booked and paid for the breakfast and did we want to wait somewhere quiet I felt very embarrassed in front of everyone one in the restaurant I showed her my booking and she said she still didn t have us booked in Everyone else they escorted to a table but not us We did eventually get our breakfast Without an apology for the embarrassment they caused us This was a special stay as we were celebrating my Husbands 50th birthday I will not be recommending this hotel or staying there again
Positive_Review: location didn t think it was 5 star

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Couldn t find anything to criticise
Positive_Review: Staff were very attentive and helpful They were also keen to not keep you waiting Best service I have had in a hotel in a while

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast was OK but for the standard of the hotel the service wasn t great and didn t reflect the rest of the hotel Tea was served from flasks and was slopped into the cups and stewed why not a teapot we are in the UK after all
Positive_Review: Hotel was a good choice would stay there again Great location rooms excellent

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast was chaotic People didn t wait to be seated and sat where they pleased As a result larger parties weren t accomodated as parties of 2 were sat on large tables A sign is needed please wait to be seated Having said that food was good and staff were very polite
Positive_Review: Good rooms and the executive room was brilliant

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Even with activated Don t Disturb sign The room service tried to open the door more than 10 times claiming that they missed a Radio device I think they re under training Second day room service some towels weren t changed
Positive_Review: For our wedding anniversary The reservation was upgraded to Jonior Suite They prepared macaroons and fruits Comfortable double bed but it would be better if its King Size Nespresso Coffee Machine Smart room using the Android Pads bathroom underfloor heating

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Sauna out of action or not turned on jacazza jets were very weak no list in bedroom of what coffee pod was what
Positive_Review: Handy for city comfy room Very good shower good make up mirror

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: First Floor Restaurant staff were unhelpful and slow to provide service at 4pm We wanted to grab a quick bite before the train but they wasted our time so we got up and left
Positive_Review: Great rooms and very friendly staff We really liked the attention to detail in the rooms and the very friendly Front Desk and Concierge staff

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Being used the country I found it a little noisy at night but that was my only problem
Positive_Review: on the way to the room we happened to mention to the women it was my birthday and she insisted on giving us complementary gifts which were cakes it was lovely The breakfast and room were fab aswell

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: very little to moan about maybe a swimwear dryer would be handy in the changing rooms
Positive_Review: pillows were extra comfy breakfast was realy tasty and pool was amaizballs

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The staff We had been told when we checked in the hotel that the pool is open from 8AM till 9PM we made sure we got back to our hotel at 8PM so we could have an hour or so in the pool we got in the lift to go downstairs to the pool the lift always stops half way at nearly EVERY stop on the way down as someone else will press the button finally we got the pool and the lady had turned around said oh the last check in was 8 30 and its now 8 32 HOW RUDE IS THAT 2 minutes I was more than shocked We had recently spent two nights at the shard Shangri La hotel the night before and decided we wanted to stay another 2 nights in London so we stupidly chose this place never again We were allowed to go into the Shangri La hotel sky pool even 5 minutes before it closes so why the hell did it matter if we were 2 minutes late because of their stupid lifts I complained to the lady all we got offered was a complimentary free drink Which we did not want We wanted her to turn around just let us in the pool for 20 minutes The next day we got breakfast room service in our room which was amazing But the second morning we had ordered it took an hour to come then we didn t even get a choice of which toast brown white Scrambled egg fried which we got offered the first morning The guy then came into our room with the breakfast had said oh I came in at 7 this morning and I had to make your hot chocolates myself which was NO excuse to us And the drinks were cold as an ice drink when we checked out we where then CHARGED for room service but our breakfast was included They had also charged me 127 deposit without even letting me know Luckily I checked my bank statement I had to even call up a few days later to make them refund it to me as it took 5 days From going to the shard to this hotel was the worst mistake of my life
Positive_Review: The room was very modern absolutely beautiful Also the pool and the spa on the ground floor was so lovely

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Breakfast was ok but could had more choice for vegetaians ie veggie sausages for the hot meal More fruit choices
Positive_Review: Staff are very attentive always said hello and offered help Very welcoming feel room was lovely and the heated floors and tablets added a nice touch to the stay

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Nothing really if I was being really picky then check in was a bit slow
Positive_Review: The style the staff the gadgets they even had a scent machine upmarket air freshener Breakfast was good as well and the bar on the ground floor is great you even get a metal straw with your g t

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The bed was not good very uncomfortable the tablet to switch the lights on broke down making going to the bathroom dangerous The breakfast was very plain and cost to much

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Positive_Review: Hotel is beautiful extremely stylish with excellent facilities the spa is a very nice feature for the price The rooms are very spacious and clean with the nice little touches with the lighting and gadgets Breakfast was delicious and all freshly cooked so no limp eggs or bacon all very tasty ingredients too Staff were also very pleasant and accommodating Great location with a sainsburys lock next door and 2 minutes to the train and lots of nice bars places to eat Will definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Everything is ran off of a tablet which sounds cool but I can assure you it s faster to hit a switch than to tap the screen find the light you want and turn it on The tablets never actually turn off so they are kind of a pain to sleep next to They try to make the rooms smell real good by putting some aroma therapy box but it s REAL strong and we had to have it removed from the room as it was way to overwhelming With all the technology the room has to offer the TV has no tv guide after a long day touring London we had to flip through every single channel to find what we wanted to watch Super annoying
Positive_Review: It was close to the underground The pool and hot tub were nice The bed was super comfortable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: throughout our stay the staff were really friendly and made sure we were happy with every little detail I had contacted them beforehand to ask for a few little touches to be added to the room to make it all the more special and they fulfilled this in the loveliest of ways rose petals on the bed cupcakes and a card We loved the way the room functioned through tablets and couldn t get enough of the lighting in the bedroom and the underfloor heating in the bathroom It came with everything we could need and more Not only was it stunning on the eye but also especially comfortable and clean too We had a hard time leaving this spot of luxury behind so will be sure to stay here again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Positive_Review: The staff were really friendly and did everything they could to make you feel special and make your time there as great of an experience as possible Theodora was the receptionist who signed us in when she found out it was a special occasion our room was upgraded she was very helpful The hotel room was amazing the rooms are spacious and everything is high tec We had a few problems with the lights kept on going off as everything is controlled by a tablet but we rang reception and was fixed within minutes Very close to Old Town station so in Central London within minutes I would 100 recommend this hotel to anyone who would like to make there stay as relaxing as possible in the busy city of London The spa is also worth a visit great atmosphere and very clean facilities We didn t buy breakfast but we wish we did when we booked it as could of got it for much cheaper Great hotel in a great location

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Arrived quite late as we were out with investors checked in at 7am Requested for a late checkout which the hotel gave till 2pm which was great Checkout did take around 20 minutes which imho is just way too long Was awaken by a construction site RIGHT next to the hotel at around 8am which we weren t even told about That went on for a good few hours I was then woken by room service at 11 30am even though i requested a late checkout and had pushed the button to not be disturbed Had to go to the door and explain I was then woken up AGAIN at 12 30pm by room service and had to explain The price you pay to stay here you d expect way better service No apology at checkout either It s a real shame as the hotel really is great
Positive_Review: Great hotel Great integration of tech Awesome building in an ideal location

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: We stayed at the hotel for two nights Our expectations according to the cost level was obvious very high After a day out we came back at 4pm and found our room uncleaned We had to spend half an hour in the reception waiting while the room was cleaned We were offered a cup of coffee as compensation Day two after a breakfast outside we got back to the room and our key didn t work Down to the reception again and listened to I m sorry sir Our conclusion is that this hotel don t live up to their description and i vigorously over priced

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Most of the staff have very weak English Public areas are dirty and sticky Room can be cleaned even as late as 3 4pm Sometimes they might simply skip your room The hotels address are being printed wrong which for me personally make missing post situations The Club Room looks more like bistro very unconftable very average In bar there are no offered peanuts all tho for even average five star hotel there should be at least three different types of snacks Restorana will charge you even for bred To room service prices they will ad 2 50 and after that another 12 5 of bill Technology in rooms is braking down every single day so maintenance team in your room wouldn t be anything unusual In bigger picture at the moment it can be rated as average 4 hotel

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: All small stuff here but things to take note 1 Some of the tech is overkill and has glitches when you just need to simply hit the lights off but this area Shoreditch is known for being a tech hub so its understandable what they are trying to do 2 Also alarm in spa kept going off because they had i big red button in the steam room that people kept pressing thinking it would create more steam Terrible design and I m sure its going to get fixed after the incident 3 Construction is taking place next door so depending on the room it can be noisy 4 Not the hotels fault but there were some rude snobby guests It seems to attract a crowd that thinks they are much cooler than they really are 5 Not really much of a view or open light Windows were slivers but that said it didn t seem to intrude on the comfort and feel of the space
Positive_Review: 1 Overall Chic cool fun vibe amazing location really new hotel 2 Amenities Overall the spa is very cool waterfall in the pool hot tub saunas chill room etc and comes complimentary to all guests The accents Nespresso machine complimentary teas etc all top notch 3 Room The shower bathroom was elite and modern very comfy bed romantic customizable mood lighting all great 4 Service was also exceptional and manager was extremely accommodating to us

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The bar staff were not friendly and came across as being very rude and there were certainly two members of staff who were not bothered about customer service Im not usually one to ever complain but waiting 40 minutes for a drink while they serve others was not acceptable The bar staff were a let down to the rest of their team
Positive_Review: Very well kept facilities were great The reception staff were very efficient and very helpfull

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The breakfast was AWFUL Probably the worst I have ever had All buffet style stale greasy sausages old fried eggs with skin on them and cold beans cold beans that takes some doing We couldn t work out if there was or wasn t fresh coffee available and the staff we asked just wafted their hand I eventually found a coffee machine and had a rubbish latte Three cereal options were available upon asking where the sugar was on the table It was but as sugar lumps We also couldn t find the toast I would have asked the staff but we had given up by now and they seemed too busy gossiping I can think of NO reason to ever have breakfast here think sainsbury s 3 99 breakfast but far FAR worse I should add this was at 8 in the morning kind of a normal time for breakfast We stayed on a saturday we arrived back at 1 30am and the bar was shut that just about sums it up lovely building but clearly the guests are an inconvenience

Negative_Review: Just a suggestion really Used the spa on Sunday morning after a post theatre lie in Missed breakfast as it finished at 11 Would have loved to have had brunch post checkout but only lunch was available There is such a brunch culture in the area I wonder if this would be attractive to both guests and non residents Ended up at the Shoreditch Grind which was lovely but would have preferred to have brunched with you to round off a wonderful stay
Positive_Review: Loved it all

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: A cleaner didn t come to our room despite putting the light signal on for our room to be cleaned There was also an issue with the phone in our room We wanted to contact Room Service however the phone wasn t ringing or contacting anyone tried calling the Reception desk and the Concierge desk as a test According to a technician that checked our phone by our request they had stated that the phone was disconnected for some odd reason
Positive_Review: The room and facilities were lovely

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: It was so new that the room smelled a little like paint
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel Staff great Spa was really nice small but nice Hotel was clean Got a free upgrade due to anniversary

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The Staff where really accommodating and welcoming I loved the technical system in the room and the guest experience host was friendly and generous with gifts

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Overly techy too much technology going on Lights curtains tv all tied into one tablet on the bed side table which you cant remove from the stand meaning you have to get out of bed to change the channel or do anything the bedside lamp needs to be switched off at the mains Always a lag on the touch pads to do anything Came away with a sore back due to the bed being mega soft and spongy Spent the last night sleeping on the floor Also 29 for a breakfast Really Is the bacon from unicorns Are the beans magic
Positive_Review: Lovely looking hotel couldnt fault the staff at all they really couldnt have been more helpful The views we had from 13th floor were amazing so can only imagine what they would be like from higher The rooms were well kitted out and very clean Excellent location as bus stops within metres and tube is a short 5 min walk away

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Electronic devices in room mean lots of ambient light not good Should be at least possible to dim them or switch them off TV did not work froze and then could not be watched any further Guests in room next door seemed to exit and enter their room about 50 times between 00 00 and 03 00 The doors slammed very loudly each time Given that the hotel cannot control guests shouldn t be expected to then perhaps some mechanism on doors to prevent slamming is helpful
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly Room spacious and comfortable Good location

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Bad view area not so good at night Spa was ok but kids in pool and jacuzzi so not very tranquil for a relaxing spa Stayed at many montcalms before felt this was not to gheir standard
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfortable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: I will not say the location is very bad but honestly it is a little bit far away from everything
Positive_Review: Stuff Specially Angelica from Reception Hotel is really wonderful in almost everything

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: It s a 15 minute walk to Moorgate tube station Ok if it s not raining Just nitpicking
Positive_Review: Great swimming pool and spa free for guests with abundance of towels Very comfortable beds helpful staff This hotel lives up to it s 5 stars

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: A lady from housekeeping knocked on my door twice loudly even with the don t disturb sign on When requested a one hour late check out reception were very reluctant Was told 40 mins max
Positive_Review: The decor

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Check in took 25 minutes Receptionist was very slow and not very friendly I booked a twin for me and my daughter and she tried to put us in a double and then said we had an upgrade which didn t happen once we eventually got to the twin room I booked there was only one set of towels Not good enough
Positive_Review: The room was excellent and very comfortable

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: We had problems with the tablets for the lights etc at first but we managed to get the electrician from the hotel to fix them The tablets can be quite temperamental
Positive_Review: The rooms were very nice had all of the facilities that we needed great location Staff were very welcoming

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The lift down to the pool You can only use certain lifts to get down there but the wrong one keeps coming and you have to send it away Was quite amusing for a while but I am sure this is easily fixed
Positive_Review: They upgraded us the swimming pool spa area was lovely and quiet staff were great

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Even though the room was completely pre booked and the amount had left our company card they would not allow me to check in without this card so they had to refund the card and make me pay personally quite annoying
Positive_Review: Really techy rooms ability to control everything underfloor heating mood lighting and music library through a tablet oh and electronic curtains

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We stayed for our one year wedding anniversary and the hotel were had kindly made us anniversary cupcakes they upgraded us and they even gave us a late check out We felt very lucky and cannot wait to stay here again

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything was great from service to rooms to facilities to location Also we got upgraded to a junior suite and the guest services left us an extra special treat of two delicious chocolate cupcakes as it was my Husband s birthday

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Only minor but touch screen pads kept having to be re booted and tv remote a bit unresponsive
Positive_Review: Free wifi no hotel should be charging and I choose not to stay if they do V modern V friendly staff V Clean room etc

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Nothing really bad but the high tech controls in the bedrooms were in some ways a bit silly To locate an icon on a touch screen to turn on the bathroom light seems IT for the sake of it A simple switch would be a bit more intuitive Also the tv needed re booting and two of the touch screens died It didn t matter but it seems a bit OTT
Positive_Review: Lovely modern clean hotel Quiet and comfortable Nice friendly staff

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Construction just outside very dirty windows noise insulation not very good
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff and management design of the hotel is very nice

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Nothing this hotel is excellent would recommend
Positive_Review: The hotel looked wonderful beautiful inside and out staff were wonderfully amazing and nice from the time we checked in till the time we checked out Very nice and extremely clean rooms and the technology was nice to play around with wish we stayed longer Would recommend

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: There was a problem with the water in my room no pressure no hot water but in fairness they fixed it pretty swiftly on my second night
Positive_Review: Fantastic quality of hotel Fantastic facilities Reasonable prices

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel Best hotel I have stayed in London From the high tech facilities to the comfort of the room and its furniture Also loved the lighting ambience which adds character your room Bathroom was decorated with rose petals as part of the guest experience A beautiful hotel which represents 5 star at its best in a nice local location for those who love the area Found parking on the roads nearby which was even better

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Spacious rooms the beds are comfy the staffs are so kind I didn t get to visit the spa or pool area but I m planning my next trip to London and I ll sure be staying there The cooking was 100 excellent Also a Stocked mini bar n fresh fruits in the rooms

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Although a great system in theory we found that our rooms tv continually kept freezing due to it being Wi Fi connected so watching tv was impossible Fabulous food in the evening although I d imagine it would become less exciting if one were staying for many nights as the menu was small
Positive_Review: Overall experience was fantastic The 3d effect design of the building was amazing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The location as we were in london on vacation we had to change lines to get to central london which was not convenient although it was close to the Crntre
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent The hotel technology although u Have to reset from time to time

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Coffee machine was hard to use pool an gym were no where to be found which was a dissappointment Staff took out 100 deposit from my bank account for mini bar but after took it out said it would be about 2 weeks before it went back in
Positive_Review: Comfiest bed I ve ever slept in room service was brilliant Lovely touches in the room such as fruit an mood lighting Shower was excellent

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Couldn t get in the spa because of overcrowding on a Saturday early evening
Positive_Review: Clean modern technology that works Plenty of places left calmly for breakfast and evening meals

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: The staff although extremely polite and attentive could offer a more personal service with a bit more fluidity to the check in process That said I m aware it s a very new hotel and this will undoubtedly come with time and experience Could you condense maid service with the checking of the mini bar to cause less disturbance Maybe asking a little too much from a hotel gym but could be better equipped in terms of free weights
Positive_Review: The tech in the rooms although a bit of an overkill adds a special touch and makes for an exciting stay Room tastefully decorated mood lighting is a great addition Spotlessly clean simply cannot fault the facilities except radio which only had one channel and speaker quality Check out a breeze somewhere for us to store our luggage all day Staff always polite and attentive

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Couldn t really fault anything apart from it would have been fantastic to have the shampoos restocked and coffee capsules restocked up during our stay As went without coffee on our second morning as we had drank on our first day
Positive_Review: Fantastic pool spa facilities super soft bathrobe comfy bed super clean very modern Oh and the home made spiced rum we tried at the hotel bar was to die for Kudos to the creator it is the best spiced rum I ve ever tried where can I get a bottle

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Love the look and hi tech features of the whole place it felt a very comfortable stay but more than that it felt special We will definitely go back The staff were wonderful too Thank you

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: its ultra modern and thus depends highly on technology No switches all touch interfaces Which is great when it works all the time not most of the time Our tablet interface sometimes had a bathroom not responding message

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Standard room was a very good size for London Staff were extremely friendly and welcoming Beds were very comfortable and the Elemis products were great Free Nespresso pods with machine and take away cups a great idea in the room Pool and sauna area were very relaxing

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Brand new and don t think they ve accommodated infants before Staff kindly provided a Tommee Tippee bottle warmer and a new cot but no kettle to actually make the formula or sterilise the bottles Requesting a kettle was met with confusion room service ended up delivering bottles of mineral water then a jug of boiled water then took the boiled water away and gave us a kettle brand new complete with plastic plug cover Farcical but could be teething problems for the hotel not our baby Very apologetic about it all The tablet controlled room was very cool and novelty but awkward in practice
Positive_Review: Great location friendly and helpful staff room was very well designed and furnished

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City

Hotel_Name: M by Montcalm Shoreditch London Tech City
Negative_Review: Almost too much reliance on computer driven mechanisms in teh room The light and TV switches did not always respond or were erratic or there was a time delay The do not disturb and clean room icons outside were tricky to get right and were displayed simultaneously and we could not change them so housekeeping came knocking while we were still there not their fault of course Locartion is tricky coming from the Islington direction as taxi drivers do not yet know where the hotel is and there is a need to turn sharp right on City Road which can easily be missed It would have been nice to be ab le to open a window
Positive_Review: The staff couold not have been more helpful and charming Christine welcomed us and took us to our room They found a kettle for me one had been promised on the internet booking form but they are not supplied as standard and this was one reason we booked with you in the first place Fresh fruit was put in our room on day one and the complimentary water was also apprecaited The room was quiet and had good air conditioning
